#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#define PRINT(x)           cout << #x << "  " << x << endl
using namespace std;
int arr[20];
set<int> diff;
void fun(int l,int m,int sum)
{
	if(l>m)
	{
		if(sum>0)
		diff.insert(sum);
		//cout<<sum<<"\n";
		return;
	}
	fun(l+1,m,sum);
	fun(l+1,m,sum+arr[l]);
	fun(l+1,m,abs(sum-arr[l]));
}
main()
{
	 int c,k;
	 while(scanf("%d",&c),c!=0)
	 {
		scanf("%d",&k);
		diff.clear();
		for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
		cin>>arr[i];
		fun(0,k-1,0);
	        cout<<c<<" "<<diff.size()<<"\n";	
	 }
}
